about.bio:
My experience spans the entire technology stack—from embedded systems, hardware bringup, and OS development to cloud services, frontend, and AI.

I've successfully led both open-source and enterprise projects, helping teams achieve technical excellence and innovation. I'm proficient in multiple programming languages, and highly skilled with the use of modern AI developer tooling and practices. I thrive in hands-on leadership roles, and am committed to continuous learning and self improvement.

You might know me as the creator of [CyanogenMod](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CyanogenMod), now [LineageOS](https://lineageos.org/), which became the largest open-source Android distribution, empowering millions of people to take control of their devices. I also co-founded the company which was formed to support its development.

When I'm not hacking on code or flashing devices, you'll find me skating with my roller derby team, producing electronic music, or creating and contributing to open-source projects. Check out all my work on [GitHub](https://github.com/hyperb1iss).
about.contactIntro: I'm always excited to connect with fellow technologists, creators, and innovators. You can reach me via email or using any of the links below. Here's how we might work together:

contactReasons.description: Need help building or customizing a device, getting a BSP in shape, building a mobile app, or integrating AI? Let's discuss your technical challenges.
contactReasons.title: Technical Consultation

contactReasons.description: Looking for a keynote speaker or technical presenter? I'd love to share insights at your next event.
contactReasons.title: Speaking Engagements

contactReasons.description: Have an interesting project or idea and need help building it? I'm always open to exploring new opportunities and partnerships.
contactReasons.title: Collaboration

contactReasons.description: Seeking guidance in technology leadership or system design? Let's connect and grow together.
contactReasons.title: Mentorship
